resources.string: Simple to remember password. Can be used for not very responsible purposes.
Still quite simple to remember password, but more strong. Can be used for the most of personal purposes.
Sure, you can remember this password. Very strong password. Can be used for personal and working purposes.
Written by Igor Solkin.\nFor any questions please contact me by e-mail\ninbox@tomclaw.com

I know that many people write passwords on stickers, someone stores them in the file "passwords.txt".
Some use passwords like "qwerty2", others have one password for all resources.
The only correct solution is to create strong, but memorable passwords.
And KvassWord doing a great job!
